group_1.textRight: ...You're saying that box produces
the things needed for us to smile...
So for example, something we need
to fulfill our wishes will come out of that box... @Is it something like that?
That's an interesting box.

group_1.textLeft: Thanks!

group_1.textRight: Although, what could this key be for...?

group_1.textLeft: It looks about the size of a room key.

group_1.textRight: Something we need...
Perhaps... this is the key for those archives we @talked about just now,
the ones we never had the key for?

group_1.textLeft: Ah...that's probably it!

group_1.textRight: ...It opened! Amazing...even though we went @through so much trouble before!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:120302:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Heheh! That's the magic of the Reindeer Santas!
Alright then, let's split up.
Let's look for any books that might be related to @those two's memories!

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much.

group_1.textCenter: I'll start by opening up the closest book and having @a look.

group_1.narration: [textBlack:As the three of us walk home after the rain,] @[textBlack:my childhood friend sees a puddle... @and goes, splash!]
[textBlack:How can I learn to notice it sooner,] @[textBlack:like my friend who naturally avoids it...?]

group_1.textRight: It's as I told you earlier, they're someone's thoughts, wishes, and memories...
They take shape as these books.
We call them "diaries".

group_1.textLeft: So this book's...?

group_1.narration: [textBlack:Sei... *Ahem* @Future Star still hasn't returned from her walk,] @[textBlack:and it's already been a quarter of a double-hour...]@[textBlack:Thirty minutes, if I were to use modern terms.]

[textBlack:The shopping district is clearly empty, @where are you walking...?]@[textBlack:*Gasp*... I thought no one was in town... @Was that actually false!?] @[textBlack:No way, "They", the World Domination Committee...] @[textBlack:laid a trap, even in such a deserted area...?]

group_1.textLeft: I don't get what any of this means!!

group_1.textRight: It looks like the "diary" of a daydreaming child.

group_1.textLeft: ...In other words, is this what you mean?
The thoughts and desires felt by everyone in the @world each day
gather in this library and become books one after another...
Even now, at this very moment!

group_1.textRight: ...Yes, it would seem so.

group_1.textLeft: That's a hella lotta books. How are we even gonna @get around to readin' them all!?

group_1.textRight: If there's any meaning to that key, then there @should be a hint in this archive.
That's a lot easier than searching all over town.

group_1.textLeft: How about we do this...?
Let's search through the diaries together,
and if we find any books related to Nayuta and@Rabi's memories, we hand them over.
If at first glance, the contents appear to be about something else,
we librarians will take them and label them @according to their contents...
...Sounds good to me!

group_1.textRight: No objections. @Thank you.

group_1.textLeft: You two are looking for missing people, right?
I wonder what they're like...

group_1.textRight: Nayuta respects and is fond of her missing person...
Rabi said she holds deep respect and trust @for hers.

group_1.textLeft: Maaan, somethin's off... @They kinda feel the same.
Ain't the two people you're searching for the same person?

group_1.textRight: You're saying the important person I'm searching @for...
could be the same person Rabi is looking for?
That's certainly possible,
since we both harbor the same feelings of respect @for them.

group_1.textLeft: You mean they're a very upstanding individual?

group_1.textRight: Yes, which is how we share this commonality.
Although, I think from Lady Nayuta's point of view,@they must have been much closer,
because she said she held deep affection for them.

group_1.textLeft: Something like...friends?

group_1.textRight: Maybe...something like "family"?

group_1.textLeft: Family? What's that?

group_1.textRight: I've been curious about this word for a while... @Look at this diary.

group_1.narration: [textBlack:The first time I climbed to the top @of the mountain with her,]@[textBlack:I felt a happiness that I hadn't felt since I climbed @with my "family" a long, long time ago.]
[textBlack:When I said that to her, she replied, @"...What's "family"?" @I was at a loss for words.]

group_1.textRight: The word "family" that appears in this diary
seems to mean "someone closer than a friend".

group_1.textLeft: Family...
